helpText.example:
• Enter your GaleÂ® site ID in the space provided below. The site ID may contain a combination of alpha/numeric characters, varying in length.

    Example: The site ID immediately follows /itweb/ in a URL. The site ID in the following URL is aa11bb22.

http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/aa11bb22?db=AIM


  • If no site ID is specified, your Gale Group links may not function properly, as Gale Group requires this information for authentication.
  • If you are unable to locate the site ID, please contact Gale Group. For contact information, visit: http://access.gale.com/authentication/.
